name: Galactic Wars (kamilcoolas)
description:
Evil Emperor have conquer The Galaxy and almost destroy The Resistance. You are the only hope. Good Luck.

Galactic Wars is a simple arcade shoot 'em up with upgrade system and rougue-lite mechanics.

Icludes:

  • Random mission generator - enemy waves and rewards varied
  • 5 system to upgrades (Each have 6 levels)
  • 4 different enemy types
  • Very exciting boss fight
  • Game Lenght: Around 1 hour
  • Fun: Unlimited :)
